CustomField.formula: IF( !Agrement__c , Account__r.ND_Cover__c, Montant_agrement__c ) - IF( ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Pays__c, 'FRANCE'), (( RentPrimaryQuoteAuthorized__c*2) + (RentContractInProgress__c*2)), (( Account__r.RentPrimaryQuoteAuthorized_RoW__c*2) + (Account__r.RentContractInProgress_RoW__c*2)) )
CustomField.label: Limite de credit
